jobDescription: Position DataSystems Analyst SME Location United States Texas Lackland AFB US Citizenship Required for this Position Yes Relocation Assistance No relocation assistance available Clearance Type This position is an ADP Level II position and requires a NACLC Who We Are Sumaria Systems Inc is a CMMI Level 3 appraised ISO 90012008 certified Information Technology Engineering and Professional Services and Solutions Company headquartered in Danvers Mass With operating locations across the US Sumaria provides a full range of services and is capable of responding rapidly and accurately to meet our clients surge requirements Sumaria has a proven track record of delivering cost effective services and solutions to our clients on time and within budget With more than 30 years of experience and hundreds of successful projects Sumaria provides a diverse range of technology based solutions and is recognized as a source of quality information technology engineering and professional services and solutions for the Department of Defense and the Federal contractor community Job Description Manages one Windows based server that is used to process the incoming data and host the Secure Fi le Transfer application MOVEit DMZ Consults with other HID projects concerning CHCS data Serves as backup for other BDQAS positions as necessary Provide analysis of data requirements to determine data elements field and table interrelationships projected data size and data growth HIPAAPII data security access and retention requirements and fault tolerance and disaster recovery requirements Designs and implements custom reports in MOVEit DMZ for assessing data receipt system performance security concerns and other ad hoc reporting as needed Designs implements and maintains SQL Server Integration Services SSIS packages for data loading and report generation Assesses documents and remediates Extract Transform and Load ETL processes and develops automation mechanisms for unattended processing of data feeds from source systems Serve as subject matter expert on SQL and database issues providing cross team support and advice on a variety of issues pertaining to RDBMS usage data retrieval and statistical analysis Minimum ExperienceEducation Security Requirement This position is an ADP Level II position and requires a NACLC Must meet DoD 857001 IAT Level II Certification Sec Windows 2008 R2 system administration Database systems including MS SQL 20052008 and MySQL System performance server backups emergency planning and network trouble shooting SQL programming SSIS package design and Data Transfer System package design Database design and management is desired as this position performs DBA functions for BDQAS What We Offer Sumaria is a place where you can put your innovative thinking and business skills into high gear and work alongside other highly intelligent and motivated people Its a place where you can apply your skills to some of the worlds most challenging interesting and meaningful projects worldwide Its a place that values the diversity of our areas of practice and our people Its what makes Sumaria a great place to work and grow Sumaria is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race color creed religion national origin sex sexual orientation gender identity and expression age disability or Vietnam era or other eligible veteran status or any other protected factor
